name: Thumbnails for Figma Projects
description:
Hello Creative People 👋,

I created thumbnails for better management of files in figma


So, these templates will help you keep a clean and easily readable project and file overview. They are color-coded to give you a synopsis of the project and file statuses at a glance.


This file includes 8 predefined work status depicted as steps based on your team's process.


💡 Exploration

⭕️ Pending

⏰ In progress

🍭 In Review

😎 Ready for dev

🔬 Design QA

✅ Finished

📦 Draft


All covers are:

  • easily customizable to adopt to your needs
  • created with autolayout to embrace content nicely
  • technically crafted using Figma's recommended frame dimensions including a safe zone area to ensure all thumbnails always display optimally



✉️ Feel free to knock me for freelance projects.
